Introduction

1TYM, an acronym for "1 Time For Your Mind", was a four-member South Korean hip-hop boy group under YG Entertainment. The group consisted of Oh Jinhwan, Teddy Park, Song Baekyoung, and Danny Im. They debuted on November 1, 1998, with their first studio album "One Time For Your Mind".

The group went on hiatus in January 2006 due to Jinhwan's mandatory military service. Even though they have not officially disbanded, it is unlikely the group would be active again as it's been almost 20 years since their last release and every member has been doing their own thing since.
